thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au
thread.title: Inga

author: Inga
title: Inga
text:
optimal print service is very user friendly and easy to use, in addition, being able to create invitations without having to be a premium member or anything like that.
also great customer service, i made a few spelling errors on my invitations, only to realise after i had recieved them & they were so helpful in assissting in getting a new bach. They have honestly, got my loyalty and i will always recommend optimal.
also well priced for the quality.,
